sources.title: Paint Pot Symphony (1949)
sources.description: A trio of house painters, a cat, a dog and a bird, undertake to decorate the exterior of a skyscraper, and end up, involuntarily, performing a ballet---set to symphony music---on the high scaffolding. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/paint-pot-symphony-1949/

metadata.Plot: A trio of house painters, a cat, a dog and a bird, undertake to decorate the exterior of a skyscraper, and end up, involuntarily, performing a ballet---set to symphony music---on the high scaffolding.
metadata.Writer: Connie Rasinski, John Foster, Tom Morrison
